## Properties

| Property             | Attribute            | Description                        | Type         | Default     |

| `bottomButtonText`   | `bottom-button-text` | Define card's bottom button text   | `string`     | `undefined` |
| `headerText`         | `header-text`        | Define card's header text          | `string`     | `undefined` |
